title: What happens when you AFK AGAIN after typing "I Agree" in a text box that appears?
body: Because of Leaver Buster "I Agree" text box appeared and I'm wondering what happen if you get reported for AFK again. Is there a way to have your account clear of reports?

replies.body: I think there should only be Leaver Buster for rank because normals, bots and Aram shouldn't count.

But ranked is the only thing that matters if you lose, losing a normals does nothing bad it doesn't add to any total defeats stat or deduct wins from your profile, the only thing that happens is you get slightly worse mmr which means you vs easier people next time, not exactly worth giving punishment to someone over,

Sure it's bad to afk but if you have a laggy connection or know the cousins are coming round In a bit and need to stop playing, then just don't play ranked, tech and real life issues shouldn't stop you playing the game altogether. Which it does atm

Play a custom, do 1v1s against bots or invite one of your friends to play a 1v1 lane test against you. Don't ruin the experience for 4/9 other people who are expecting you to play a full game. It really isn't that hard and customs don't count towards the leave-buster/low-priority queue setup.

It really isn't that hard.

> [{quoted}](name=Archanjewl,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fgaNXyAj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-07T05:32:17.696+0000)
>
> I think there should only be Leaver Buster for rank because normals, bots and Aram shouldn't count.

I don't agree with you... completely. Ranked should have harsher penalties. If it must enter a tiered system, normals should come next and as ARAM is a very casual queue, consequences should be less severe, but still tangible to prevent trolling. Bots however should not count. It should be the queue people can enter if they are not sure how much time they have. After all, a player leaving also means a bot leaving.

Bots leave to a degree, until there are only 3 left (I think). Maybe you should be able to afk in a bot game (but seriously, why not just play a custom against bots). The problem being with newer players playing against bots will have a lot of trouble killing them even when the entire team is there. Maybe being able to afk from bot games past summoner level 15 or something.
the "I agree" box appears after your first leave. that's all you have to do to have it appear, it's not because you got reported, but because you left a game.
Probably end up in low priority queue.

I hope that's all they do, it's practically unfair for people who have bad connection and since lately I haven't been AFK due to people telling me to get off League and disconnecting me now and I'm not playing on laggy computers anymore.
